alert.note: Alert for Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 29 at 10:13PM EST until January 30 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches for a storm total of 8 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Franklin, Southern Oxford, Southern Somerset and Interior Cumberland Highlands Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Wind chills values will continue to fall into the single digits and teens below zero.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..

area.areaDesc: Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset
